item.description:
A former employee plays bass in a band called SPF-4 (www.spf-4.com), and I thought some people might be interested in going.

Saturday September 26 - Ralph's Diner, Worcester - '1st annual Rumble at Ralph's'
During the day a hot rod show's in front of the diner.

The musical lineup is:
Preston Wayne Four at 8:30PM (according to their MySpace page, "Sounds Like Nitro fueled DICK DALE mixed with Hendrix in an ACID bath surfin THE 1320)

SPF-4 at 9:30 (Surf music)

Werewolves on Wheels (from Maine - 10:30?) (they take their name from a 1971 B-movie about bikers, Satanists, and werewolves--they play punk),

The Octomen (Rock/Surf; from NY - 11:30?)

Angry Johnny & The Killbillies (not sure how to classify this--kinda Buddy Hollyish? check out their videos here: http://www.youtube.co... they're from MA - 12:30?)
item.name: 1st annual Rumble at Ralph's Diner, Worcester
